claimPot().details: Claims the pot and distributes participant shares Deducts the admin fee (1% of the contract balance) before distribution. Can only be called by the current leader after 1 hour has passed since the last play.

collectAdminFee().details: Allows the admin to collect a 1% fee of the contract's current balance

constructor.details: Sets the ticket price for the game

params._ticketPrice: The cost of participating in the game

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

play().details: Allows a participant to play the game Participants must send exactly the ticketPrice to play. Each play resets the 1-hour timer and updates the current leader.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

@dev Sets the ticket price for the game
 @param _ticketPrice The cost of participating in the game

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the current leader can claim the pot"

documentation.text: @dev Allows the admin to collect a 1% fee of the contract's current balance
@dev Internal function to collect a 1% fee of the contract's current balance

@title Cash Pot Game
 A game where participants can play by sending ETH. The last player to play
 before a 1-hour timeout can claim the pot. The pot is split, with the majority
 going to the winner, a portion distributed among participants, and a fee for the admin.
